text: Milton Conrad Schmidt (March 5, 1918 - January 4, 2017) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre, coach and general manager, mostly for the Boston Bruins of the National Hockey League. He was an Honoured Member of the Hockey Hall of Fame. From 2014 until his death in 2017, Schmidt was the oldest living former NHL player. Schmidt was born on March 5, 1918 in Kitchener, Ontario. He was raised in Toronto, Ontario.
